scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup --globals d3:d3,g-chartcolour:gChartcolour -f umd -n gLegend -o build/g-legend.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/g-legend.js -c -m -o build/g-legend.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/g-legend.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/g-legend.js build/g-legend.min.js
